subject: Double charge on my card
body: I was charged twice for my subscription this month. Can you refund the duplicate?

subject: Login not working
body: I get a 500 error when trying to log in. Tried Chrome and Safari.

subject: Feature request: dark mode
body: It would be great to have a dark mode option in the dashboard.

subject: Account locked
body: My account says it's locked after too many login attempts. How do I unlock?
